text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hrm... Mngh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my way to go shopping, I stumble<n>across Taiki Shuttle
hunched over in<n>the middle of the road!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Howdy, Trainer! Yep, don't ya<n>worry—I got what I was
looking for...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
The best possible shot of this<n>manhole cover!
Photography's all<n>about findin' the right angle.
choice_data_list: Oh, you were taking a picture.
Oh, you were taking a picture.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's right! Manhole covers in<n>Japan have such
unique designs. My<n>family's gonna be tickled pink when I<n>
share 'em!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. ♪ See, yesterday my family<n>said they wanted to see
more of the<n>city where I live.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's why I'm on the hunt for some<n>nice photo spots! But
it's a lot of work<n>for one person...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: So come help me look, Trainer!
choice_data_list: I actually need to do some shopping...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Aww, that's too bad. And after we<n>bumped into each other
and<n>everything...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Think ya could do your shopping<n>another time? I'd really
appreciate it!<n>Pretty please?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm so happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
If we take lots of pictures, I'm sure<n>my family will be happy
too. Time to<n>find all the nice spots Japan has to<n>offer!
Here we go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Taiki forging excitedly ahead, we<n>set off in search of
prime photo spots.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Snap, snap!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Great! Japanese vending machines<n>really are on a whole
'nother level. I<n>mean, juice is one thing, but you can<n>even
buy food!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oden, udon, ramen—the list goes on!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I've never seen one that has<n>sushi! Even though it
tops the list of<n>Japanese comfort foods.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I've just had bad luck?<n>Lemme know if ya come
across one,<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Is that a photo sticker booth I<n>see? A true staple of
Japanese pop<n>culture!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: It's got me on the edge of my seat!<n>Let's go in, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'll count down for us, okay? Three,<n>two, o—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Snap!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A sticker featuring an extreme<n>close-up of Taiki attempting
to take a<n>photo pops out of the slot.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Silly Trainer! You hid behind<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
But this sure is cool! I'm gonna have<n>to share this sticker
with my family<n>too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Mmm! ♪ We really lucked out finding<n>a taiyaki stand.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
All right, Trainer! Hold on tight to that<n>taiyaki for me, 'kay?
I'm gonna snap<n>a quick photo!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Sniff, sniff... Ahh, it smells sogood.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
It's still fresh off the grill! Just look at<n>that nice, crunchy tail.
Feels like a<n>shame not to eat it right away...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Urgh... B-but the photo comes first!<n>I've got to be... strong...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Drool...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Urk! Sorry, Trainer—I'm gonna need<n>ya to stand a little
farther away!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that, Taiki and I visited place<n>after place without so
much as<n>stopping for a break.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Good! This is it—honest-to-goodnessJapanese wabi-sabi-wasabi!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
If only there was a samurai around...<n>Oh, yes! Let's go take
a picture of a<n>samurai next!
choice_data_list: The sun's about to go down, you know.
The sun's about to go down, you know.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, when did it get so late? Guess<n>we'd better call it a day
and hightail it<n>home!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. ♪ I got a bunch of great shots.<n>I'm sure this'll be
enough to—ah!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Stooooop!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I forgot the most important shot!<n>Come over here, Trainer!
Please?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hurry and scooch a bit closer.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Say cheese!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Snap!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! I got a nice shot of the two of us!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I've been wanting to introduce<n>ya to my family for a
long time.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
You're really important to me. I know<n>I can always count on
ya to support<n>me no matter what.
choice_data_list: I'm happy you feel that way.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh! Ehehe... I'm happy too! Really<n>happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: We got a lot of nice shots, but I think<n>this one's my favorite.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Thank ya so much for today, Trainer.<n>Let's go lookin' for
more nice spots<n>around Japan again sometime!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later that day, an email from the<n>United States arrives in my
inbox with<n>the subject "U.S. Pop Culture!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Attached is a family photo featuring a<n>young Taiki Shuttle
enjoying a<n>barbecue...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Below it is a short message that<n>reads, "Thanks for looking
after our<n>daughter!"
